name: Dea
description:
A classic turn-based RPG that takes in a world full of charismatic characters and interesting stories. "A self-proclaimed goddess asks a boy and his friends to protect Lastia, the last piece of land remaining in their world... but why them?"
Join them in this adventure made with RPG Maker for fans of old school RPGs.
developers: José Antonio De los Ángeles Rodríguez
publishers: José Antonio De los Ángeles Rodríguez
